name: Talisman of Hierarchy
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}. Talisman of Hierarchy deals 1 damage to you.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"You'll never get to the top if you don't know who's already there."
—Kaya

name: Thought Vessel
oracle_text:
You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Add {C}.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Infinite possibilities contained in a finite space.

name: Skullclamp
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: The mind is a beautiful bounty encased in an annoying bone container.

name: Solemn Simulacrum
oracle_text:
When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Sol Ring
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Lost to time is the artificer's art of trapping light from a distant star in a ring of purest gold.

name: Spellskite
oracle_text: {U/P}: Change a target of target spell or ability to Spellskite. ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Let's show Vorinclex that progress doesn't always need teeth or claws."
—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

name: Steel Hellkite
oracle_text:
Flying
{2}: Steel Hellkite gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{X}: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X whose controller was dealt combat damage by Steel Hellkite this turn. Activate only once each turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Maskwood Nexus
oracle_text:
Creatures you control are every creature type. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.
{3}, {T}: Create a 2/2 blue Shapeshifter creature token with changeling. (It is every creature type.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Mindcrank
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent loses life, that player mills that many cards. (Damage dealt by sources without infect causes loss of life.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Let go of your memories and be reborn."
—Argent Etchings, plate 106, passage 27

name: Orzhov Signet
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: The sigil holds different meanings depending on its form and presentation. While some wear it as a sign of status, others wear it as a sign of debt.

name: Phyrexian Revoker
oracle_text:
As Phyrexian Revoker enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"To be in the presence of a revoker is to be truly alone."
—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

name: Psychosis Crawler
oracle_text:
Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"If that brain can't figure out the secret of the serum, then add more brains."
—Rhmir, Hand of the Augur

name: Everflowing Chalice
oracle_text:
Multikicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Everflowing Chalice enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each time it was kicked.
{T}: Add {C} for each charge counter on Everflowing Chalice.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Fellwar Stone
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"What do you have that I cannot obtain?"
—Mairsil, the Pretender

name: Hedron Archive
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Hedron Archive: Draw two cards.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"You've begun to understand the hedrons' true purpose," said Ugin. "The Eldrazi can be imprisoned."
"And how did that work out last time?" asked Jace.

name: Herald's Horn
oracle_text:
As Herald's Horn enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creature spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.
At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card of the chosen type, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Izzet Signet
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

name: Lightning Greaves
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Equip {0}
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

name: Bloodthirsty Blade
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
{1}: Attach Bloodthirsty Blade to target creature an opponent controls. Activate only as a sorcery.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: The weapon wields the hand that holds it.

name: Chaos Wand
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile an instant or sorcery card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then put the exiled cards that weren't cast this way on the bottom of that library in a random order.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Dimir Keyrune
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
{U}{B}: Dimir Keyrune becomes a 2/2 blue and black Horror artifact creature until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: A key that slips through every lock.

name: Dimir Signet
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members—and the doomed.

name: Dragon's Hoard
oracle_text:
Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, put a gold counter on Dragon's Hoard.
{T}, Remove a gold counter from Dragon's Hoard: Draw a card.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Nemesis of Reason
oracle_text: Whenever Nemesis of Reason attacks, defending player mills ten cards.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Words describing it fail. Pages relating it shrivel. Tales recounting it end.

Flying
Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, Parun deals 1 damage to any target.
Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, you draw a card.

oracle_text:
Flying, haste
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Sprite Dragon.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Size of a pixie, rage of a hellkite.

Flying
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

III — Angels you control gain double strike until end of turn.

oracle_text: Each other non-Human creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "Does it matter what it is? Take it and be grateful!"

name: High Priest of Penance
oracle_text: Whenever High Priest of Penance is dealt damage, you may destroy target nonland permanent.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "All I require is faith, loyalty, obedience, trust, and complete and utter devotion."

name: Memory Plunder
oracle_text: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard without paying its mana cost.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Vengeance is the echo of the victim's own crime."
—Grensch, merrow cutthroat

name: Bloodbraid Elf
oracle_text:
Haste
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

name: Despark
oracle_text: Exile target permanent with mana value 4 or greater.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

oracle_text:

name: Escape to the Wilds

set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Extract from Darkness
oracle_text: Each player mills two cards. Then you put a creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

Whenever Brash Taunter is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.
{2}{R}, {T}: Brash Taunter fights another target creature.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "You hit like a kobold!"

name: Chain Reaction
oracle_text: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"We train for the improbable, like lightning striking the same place twice, or striking everywhere at once."
—Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

name: Chaos Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying, haste
Chaos Dragon attacks each combat if able.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, each player rolls a d20. If one or more opponents had the highest result, Chaos Dragon can't attack those players or planeswalkers they control this combat.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Chaos Warp
oracle_text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Curse of Opulence
oracle_text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a Gold token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same. (A Gold token is an artifact with "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Jingling coins beckon many an eager hand.

name: Demon Bolt
oracle_text:
Demon Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Foretell {R} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:
"Burn them from the sky."
—Varragoth

name: Agitator Ant
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. Goad each creature that had counters put on it this way. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Aurora Phoenix
oracle_text:
Flying
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
Whenever you cast a spell with cascade, return Aurora Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Avatar of Slaughter
oracle_text: All creatures have double strike and attack each combat if able.

flavor_text:
"Diplomacy has solved nothing. Only bloodspill can end this now. Call forth the warbringer."
—Basandra, Battle Seraph

name: Blasphemous Act
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.

set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text:

name: The Akroan War
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Gain control of target creature for as long as The Akroan War remains on the battlefield.
II — Until your next turn, creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.
III — Each tapped creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Woe Strider
oracle_text:
When Woe Strider enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 white Goat creature token.
Sacrifice another creature: Scry 1.
Escape—{3}{B}{B}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Woe Strider escapes with two +1/+1 counters on it.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Zulaport Cutthroat
oracle_text: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: Opening Orazca unleashed more horrors than just the Immortal Sun.

name: Syphon Mind
oracle_text: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.

name: Thwart the Grave
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
Return target creature card and up to one target Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, or Wizard creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate

name: Nihilith
oracle_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Suspend 7—{1}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{B} and exile it with seven time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, if Nihilith is suspended, you may remove a time counter from Nihilith.

name: Puppeteer Clique
oracle_text:
Flying
